{"url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/95","id":2892142093,"node_id":"PR_kwDOOcuOYs6sYpYN","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/95","diff_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/95.diff","patch_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pull/95.patch","issue_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/issues/95","number":95,"state":"open","locked":false,"title":"Feat/editable feed urls fixed","user":{"login":"sheepdestroyer","id":1377479,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjEzNzc0Nzk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/1377479?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/received_events","type":"User","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"body":"## Description\r\n\r\nThis PR adds the ability to edit feed URLs directly from the UI. Users can now click the edit button (✎) on any feed widget to update the feed URL, which automatically updates the feed name and site link.\r\n\r\n## Changes\r\n\r\n### Backend\r\n- Added `PUT /api/feeds/<feed_id>` endpoint for updating feed URLs and properties\r\n- Implemented validation to prevent duplicate feed URLs\r\n- Added CORS configuration for development\r\n- Updated port configuration to 5001 for development\r\n\r\n### Frontend\r\n- Added edit button to each feed widget\r\n- Implemented modal dialog for editing feed URLs\r\n- Added comprehensive error handling and validation\r\n\r\n### Testing\r\n- Added comprehensive tests for the new functionality\r\n- All existing tests continue to pass\r\n\r\n## Testing Notes\r\n- Backend tests require a running Redis service container\r\n- Dynamic port handling for Redis in CI environments\r\n- Environment variable `CACHE_REDIS_PORT` can override default Redis port\r\n\r\n## Deployment\r\n- Updated configuration for development environment\r\n- Maintains compatibility with existing production deployment\r\n\r\nThis feature allows users to easily update feed URLs when they change or need correction.","created_at":"2025-10-06T22:48:47Z","updated_at":"2025-10-06T22:51:13Z","closed_at":null,"merged_at":null,"merge_commit_sha":"66ed5a88ae0d18c7ea94fcd141df69bf994d5ef3","assignee":null,"assignees":[],"requested_reviewers":[],"requested_teams":[],"labels":[],"milestone":null,"draft":false,"commits_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/95/commits","review_comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/95/comments","review_comment_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/pulls/comments{/number}","comments_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/issues/95/comments","statuses_url":"https://api.github.com/repos/sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes/statuses/cf9305e448995c38d884221ecf36f73f67b8288d","head":{"label":"sheepdestroyer:feat/editable-feed-urls-fixed","ref":"feat/editable-feed-urls-fixed","sha":"cf9305e448995c38d884221ecf36f73f67b8288d","user":{"login":"sheepdestroyer","id":1377479,"node_id":"MDQ6VXNlcjEzNzc0Nzk=","avatar_url":"https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/1377479?v=4","gravatar_id":"","url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer","html_url":"https://github.com/sheepdestroyer","followers_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/followers","following_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/following{/other_user}","gists_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/gists{/gist_id}","starred_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/starred{/owner}{/repo}","subscriptions_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/subscriptions","organizations_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/orgs","repos_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/repos","events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/events{/privacy}","received_events_url":"https://api.github.com/users/sheepdestroyer/received_events","type":"User","user_view_type":"public","site_admin":false},"repo":{"id":969641570,"node_id":"R_kg
